Передовые IT-решения для киберспорта

NetX-A

Ускоритель загрузки игрового контента

Computer and gaming clubs need cutting edge IT infrastructure. It directly impacts on entire club's functioning, it's reputation and image in today's highly competitive environment

The eSports industry encourages not only the most uncompromising hardware solutions, but also the overall progress of computer technology.

The computer club network experiences higher loads than most types of General purpose computer networks.

The computer club network
infrastructure traits list:

continuously growth requirements for the internet access speed

a large number of unique visitors creates special security requirements at the level of both software and hardware.

the necessity to track and remove accidentally or specially installed malicious code (miners, collectors of passwords and personal data of visitors, computer viruses

the signal transmission delays requirements from the game computer to the game servers

Increased bandwidth requirements for intranet communications

NetX

a set of solutions for building a premium eSports club network infrastructure

General provider

Spare provider

NetX-M

NetX-B

NetX-D

NetX-A

game content download accelerator.

NetX-G

a barrier between a trusted network (internal gaming LAN) and an untrusted one (such as the Internet). So called gateway or firewall

NetX-M

Система мониторинга ПК на предмет наиболее актуальных для компьютерных клубов угроз

NetX-D

Система автоматизированной переустановки ПО игровых ПК

NetX-B

Менеджер централизованной загрузки компьютеров

NetX-S

Хранилище мультимедиа и игрового контента для компьютеров клуба
